item.description: Swan Bitcoin, a prominent player in the cryptocurrency space, has quickly gained popularity for its innovative approach to Bitcoin investing. item.content:encoded:
Swan Bitcoin, a prominent player in the cryptocurrency space, has quickly gained popularity for its innovative approach to Bitcoin investing. In this article, we will explore what Swan Bitcoin is, how it works, and the unique features that have made it a go-to platform for both novice and experienced investors alike.

What is Swan Bitcoin?

Swan Bitcoin is an online platform that facilitates Bitcoin investment in a simple and systematic manner. It was founded in 2019 by Cory Klippsten and Yan Pritzker with the aim of making Bitcoin investing accessible to everyone, regardless of their level of expertise. Unlike traditional cryptocurrency exchanges that offer a wide range of digital assets, Swan Bitcoin focuses exclusively on Bitcoin.

The platform’s main objective is to provide a user-friendly and hassle-free experience for individuals looking to invest in Bitcoin. It simplifies the investment process and encourages a long-term investment strategy. Swan Bitcoin allows users to accumulate Bitcoin gradually over time through automatic recurring purchases, also known as “stacking sats” (stacking Satoshis). Satoshis are the smallest units of Bitcoin, and Swan Bitcoin enables users to automatically purchase a specified amount of Bitcoin at regular intervals, such as weekly or monthly.

Swan Bitcoin distinguishes itself through its commitment to low fees, transparency, security, and education. The platform charges a competitive fee of 0.99% on all Bitcoin purchases, making it cost-effective for users to accumulate Bitcoin without excessive charges. It prioritizes user autonomy by allowing investors to withdraw their Bitcoin holdings to an external wallet at any time, ensuring full control over their assets. Swan Bitcoin employs robust security measures, including cold storage and multi-signature wallets, to safeguard user funds. Additionally, the platform provides educational resources such as articles and videos to help users understand Bitcoin and make informed investment decisions.

Swan Bitcoin is a platform designed to simplify the process of investing in Bitcoin. It aims to make Bitcoin accessible to a wider audience, promote a disciplined investment approach, and provide a secure and user-friendly experience for individuals interested in the world of digital currency.

The Process of Investing with Swan Bitcoin

Swan Bitcoin’s investment process is straightforward and designed to be hassle-free. To begin, users must sign up on the platform and complete a verification process, which includes identity verification and bank account linking. Once the account is verified, investors can set up recurring purchases or make one-time purchases of Bitcoin.

Swan Bitcoin stands out for its unique approach to purchasing Bitcoin. Instead of executing immediate market orders, the platform employs a technique called “stacking sats” (short for “stacking Satoshis”). Satoshis are the smallest units of Bitcoin, and Swan Bitcoin allows users to automatically purchase a specified amount of Bitcoin at regular intervals, such as weekly or monthly. This approach encourages a disciplined and long-term investment strategy, enabling users to accumulate Bitcoin gradually over time.

The process of investing with Swan Bitcoin is designed to be simple and user-friendly. Here is a step-by-step guide to investing with Swan Bitcoin:

  1. Sign Up: Visit the Swan Bitcoin website (swanbitcoin.com) and click on the “Sign Up” button to create an account. Provide the required information, including your name, email address, and password.
  2. Verification: After signing up, you will need to go through a verification process. This typically involves providing identification documents and verifying your identity. Swan Bitcoin follows strict Know Your Customer (KYC) and Anti-Money Laundering (AML) regulations to ensure the security and legitimacy of transactions.
  3. Bank Account Linking: Once your account is verified, you will need to link your bank account to your Swan Bitcoin account. This step allows you to fund your Bitcoin purchases directly from your bank account.
  4. Set Up Recurring Purchases (Optional): Swan Bitcoin offers the option to set up recurring purchases, which allows you to automatically buy Bitcoin at regular intervals. You can choose the frequency of purchases (e.g., weekly, bi-weekly, monthly) and the amount you want to invest each time. This feature encourages a disciplined investment approach and helps you accumulate Bitcoin over time.
  5. One-Time Purchases: In addition to recurring purchases, Swan Bitcoin also enables users to make one-time purchases of Bitcoin. You can manually specify the amount of Bitcoin you want to buy and proceed with the purchase.
  6. Fiat-to-Bitcoin Conversion: Once you have set up your recurring or one-time purchase, Swan Bitcoin will convert the specified amount of fiat currency (e.g., US dollars) into Bitcoin at the prevailing market rate. The converted Bitcoin will be credited to your Swan Bitcoin account.
  7. Bitcoin Storage: SB provides secure storage for your Bitcoin holdings. By default, your Bitcoin is stored in a Swan Bitcoin custodial wallet. However, the platform also offers the flexibility to withdraw your Bitcoin to an external wallet of your choice if you prefer to have full control over your funds.
  8. Monitoring and Managing Investments: You can track your Bitcoin holdings and monitor the performance of your investments through your Swan Bitcoin account. The platform provides an intuitive interface that displays your portfolio value and transaction history.
  9. Withdrawals: If you decide to sell or transfer your Bitcoin, you can initiate a withdrawal from your Swan Bitcoin account. The platform allows you to withdraw your Bitcoin to an external wallet or sell it for fiat currency, which can then be transferred back to your linked bank account.

Key Features and Benefits

Swan Bitcoin offers a range of key features and benefits that set it apart from other platforms in the digital currency investment space. Let’s delve into some of its notable features:

  1. Low Fees: SB provides a cost-effective solution for Bitcoin investment. The platform charges a competitive fee of only 0.99% on all Bitcoin purchases, allowing users to accumulate Bitcoin without excessive charges eating into their investments.
  2. Automatic Recurring Purchases: SB simplifies the investment process by offering automatic recurring purchases. Users can set up a schedule for regular Bitcoin purchases, such as weekly or monthly, through the platform. This feature encourages a disciplined investment approach, enabling users to accumulate Bitcoin over time without the need for constant manual transactions.
  3. Withdrawal Flexibility: SB prioritizes user autonomy by allowing investors to withdraw their Bitcoin holdings at any time. Users can transfer their Bitcoin to an external wallet, providing them with full control over their assets. This feature ensures that users have the flexibility to manage and secure their Bitcoin according to their personal preferences.
  4. Robust Security Measures: SB employs industry-leading security practices to safeguard user funds. The platform utilizes cold storage, which involves storing Bitcoin offline in secure facilities, keeping it inaccessible to potential hackers. Additionally, Swan Bitcoin employs multi-signature wallets, requiring multiple authorizations for any transaction, further enhancing the security of user funds.
  5. Educational Resources: SB is dedicated to educating its users about Bitcoin and empowering them to make informed investment decisions. The platform provides a range of educational resources, including articles and videos, that cover various aspects of Bitcoin, from its technology to its potential impact on the financial landscape. These resources help users deepen their understanding of Bitcoin and its investment potential.
  6. Customer Support: SB offers reliable customer support channels to assist users whenever they need assistance. Whether it’s answering queries about the platform’s features or addressing technical issues, users can reach out to the customer support team for prompt and helpful responses.

Swan Bitcoin combines simplicity, affordability, security, and educational support to provide users with a seamless and reliable platform for Bitcoin investment. These key features and benefits have made Swan Bitcoin a popular choice among both novice and experienced investors seeking to participate in the world of digital currency.

Swan Bitcoin’s Impact and Future Prospects

Swan Bitcoin has already made a significant impact on the world of digital currency investment since its inception. Its user-friendly approach, emphasis on long-term accumulation, and commitment to education have attracted a growing user base and positioned the platform as a trusted player in the industry. Let’s explore Swan Bitcoin’s impact and future prospects:

  1. Democratizing Bitcoin Investment: SB has played a crucial role in democratizing Bitcoin investment. By simplifying the investment process and offering automatic recurring purchases, the platform has made it accessible to a wider audience. Novice investors, who may have been hesitant to enter the complex world of cryptocurrency, can now participate in Bitcoin investment with ease.
  2. Promoting Dollar-Cost Averaging: SB focus on automatic recurring purchases promotes a disciplined investment strategy known as dollar-cost averaging. This strategy involves investing a fixed amount at regular intervals, regardless of the Bitcoin price fluctuations. It helps users mitigate the volatility of Bitcoin and potentially maximize their returns over the long term.
  3. Bitcoin Education and Advocacy: SB has placed a strong emphasis on educating users about Bitcoin and its potential benefits. By providing educational resources, the platform empowers users to make informed investment decisions and understand the underlying technology and principles of Bitcoin. Additionally, Swan Bitcoin actively advocates for Bitcoin adoption and its integration into mainstream financial systems.
  4. Expansion of Services: Swan Bitcoin has plans to expand its services and cater to a broader range of investors. The platform aims to introduce retirement accounts, allowing users to invest in Bitcoin as part of their long-term retirement planning. This expansion into new markets and products indicates Swan Bitcoin’s commitment to innovation and meeting the evolving needs of its users.
  5. Driving Mainstream Adoption: As Swan Bitcoin continues to grow and gain prominence, its efforts in simplifying Bitcoin investment and fostering education contribute to driving mainstream adoption of digital currencies. By providing a secure and user-friendly platform, Swan Bitcoin helps bridge the gap between traditional finance and the world of cryptocurrencies.

Swan Bitcoin has made a significant impact by making Bitcoin investment accessible, promoting a disciplined investment approach, and educating users about Bitcoin’s potential. With its expansion plans and commitment to driving mainstream adoption, Swan Bitcoin is poised to play a pivotal role in shaping the future of digital currency investment.

Conclusion

Swan Bitcoin has emerged as a leading platform for Bitcoin investment, providing users with a simple and secure way to accumulate and hold Bitcoin. With its commitment to transparency, low fees, robust security measures, and educational resources, Swan Bitcoin has revolutionized the world of digital currency investment. As the adoption of Bitcoin continues to grow, platforms like Swan Bitcoin play a crucial role in making cryptocurrency accessible to a wider audience. Whether you are a newcomer to the world of Bitcoin or a seasoned investor, Swan Bitcoin offers an intuitive and reliable platform to participate in the digital currency revolution.

item.title: Uniswap Community Chaos In Voting For LPs Fee Plan With 45% Against
item.dc:creator: Foxy
item.description: The Uniswap decentralized exchange community members are facing chaos in voting for the platform's plan to charge fees from LPs.
item.content:encoded:
Key Points:

  • Uniswap’s proposal to collect fees from LPs has been met with community resistance.
  • The vote resulted in a close match between the two proposals, with 45% of the vote expressing opposition to a fee. Meanwhile, 42% of the vote was in favor of charging 1/5 of the team fee on all Uniswap v3.
  • Protocol fee advocates can link together after a certain percentage of fees, they can win.
The Uniswap decentralized exchange community members are facing chaos in voting for the platform’s plan to charge fees from LPs.

Proposal voting results showed that 45.32% voted against charging, 42.34% supported charging 1/5 of liquidity provider fees, 12.3% voted in favor of charging 1/10, and 0.04% of votes favor 1/6 Charge being imposed.

Although support for a fee outweighs opposition for a charge (55% vs. 45%), no individual category has received greater support than the “free”. If protocol fee advocates can link together after a certain percentage of fees, they can win.

Devin Walsh, executive director of the Uniswap Foundation, said on Twitter that the poll was published for feedback and was not part of a formal governance process.

These results will not necessarily prevent further votes on the proposal. The polling site suggests that the poll data will be used to prepare for a more formal “temperature check” vote. However, the opposition to a fee is substantial.

As per previous news, GFX Labs has launched a proposal in the Uniswap community to “implement liquidity pool fees”, proposing that all Uniswap v3 pools implement agreement fees equal to 20% of pool fees and open charge conversion for Uniswap v2.

The proposal’s scope is to implement fees on the Uniswap liquidity pool, implement a fee-for-earning system, and sell designated assets to the UNI community in a trustless manner. In subsequent proposals, the UNI community can decide how to manage, distribute or use the assets to be credited to the treasury.

item.title: Binance Asks Canadian Regulators To Recall Securities Violation Investigation
item.dc:creator: Foxy
item.description: Binance could face securities-related investigations by the Securities and Exchange Commission of Ontario, Canada, if its request to rescind an investigative order is not met.
item.content:encoded:
Key Points:

  • Binance requests the Ontario Securities Commission, Canada, to drop its investigative orders regarding the exchange’s securities violations.
  • The exchange left the Canadian market a few days after receiving notices of an investigation to see if it was attempting to circumvent securities laws by regulators.
  • A hearing on whether the investigation should be dropped will take place today.
Binance could face securities-related investigations by the Securities and Exchange Commission of Ontario, Canada, if its request to rescind an investigative order is not met.

According to a document filed with the Capital Markets Court, the Securities Commission of Ontario, Canada, issued an investigative order against Binance last month, and Binance will be investigated to determine if it is intentionally circumventing securities laws.

According to the petition, the OSC’s submission requested a particularly extensive examination of whether the exchange may have attempted to evade Ontario securities laws and compliance procedures related to Binance.com or engaged in conduct contrary to Ontario securities laws or the public interest.

A few days later, Binance announced it was leaving the country due to “new guidance regarding stablecoins and investor restrictions.” When asked why it chose to leave the Canadian market, its CEO Changpeng Zhao (CZ), a Canadian citizen, said in a Twitter post that he no longer thinks running a company has interest there is possible due to the new regulations.

Binance subsequently asked the Ontario Securities Commission to drop its investigation, arguing that it was “extremely broad” and “not based on any factual facts.” Binance added in its May 18 filing that the “investigation order has no legitimate purpose” and that the exchange has withdrawn from Ontario and Canada.

According to Capital Markets Court filings, a hearing on whether to drop the investigation is set for June 2.

Binance isn’t the only crypto company that finds Canada a difficult place to do business. After, digital asset exchange Bybit said it was leaving the country, and OKX in March announced their withdrawal, citing the inability to withstand the new regulations.

Introduction

However, amidst the turbulence, decentralized finance (DeFi) has emerged as a beacon of hope, offering new opportunities and empowering investors.

DEX vs CEX

Bitcoin Halving Event

The highly anticipated Bitcoin halving event, set to take place on April 28, 2024, is a significant milestone in the world of cryptocurrencies, particularly within the Trendy DeFi ecosystem. Occurring approximately every four years, the halving event involves a reduction of the block reward given to miners by half. As these halvings progress, the creation of new Bitcoin decreases, ultimately leading to the attainment of the maximum supply.

Within the Trendy DeFi pool, this reduction in new Bitcoin creation has an impact on the price of MATIC. Consequently, it fulfills one of the conditions of the investment pool, enabling participants to exercise their voting rights. Through the implementation of a DAO mechanism, investors can vote on whether to close the pool or determine the monthly profit. In cases where the voting rate surpasses 51% agreement among the investors, the development team will adjust the interest rate percentage accordingly.

As of July 2019, there have only been two previous Bitcoin halving events. These occurred on the 28th of November, 2012, and the 9th of July, 2016. At the time of the first halving event, the price of Bitcoin was $12.31, and at the time of the second halving event, the price of Bitcoin was $650.63.

According to Binance Academy, the Bitcoin halvings timer is calculated using the following formula:

(Halving block – Next block height) * Average time between blocks – estimated time until the next block.

This decentralized governance model eliminates centralized control and empowers investors to shape the project’s future. item.title: MakerDAO Approves Vault To Invest Up To $1.28 Billion In US Treasuries
item.dc:creator: Foxy
item.description: A MakerDAO vote ending Thursday approved the proposal to invest up to $1.28 billion in US Treasuries.
item.content:encoded:
Key Points:

  • MakerDAO backs a proposal to buy US Treasuries worth $1.28 billion.
  • Maker is set to exchange 1.28 billion DAI stablecoins for short-term US Treasuries with maturities ranging from 0-6 months.
  • The proposal comes after Maker approved a proposal to increase holdings of the US Treasury bond portfolio by 150%, from $500 million to $1.25 billion.
A MakerDAO vote ending Thursday approved the proposal to invest up to $1.28 billion in US Treasuries.

Following the proposal submitted on the MakerDAO governance forum earlier this month, the Andromeda Project was launched by Blocktower Capital Advisors LP under MIP90. According to the asset purchase schedule posted on the admin forum, 1/6 (16.67%) of the total DAI stock will be allocated to the US Treasury in 0-1 month. Equal allocations have been listed for 1-2 month bonds, 2-3 month bonds, etc.

MakerDAO Governance will instruct trading parties to mint Dai, exchange Dai for other stablecoins held in PSM, and buy US Treasury bonds evenly over maturities ranging from 0 to 6 months.

Voters unanimously supported opening a new real-world asset vault (RWA) called BlockTower Andromeda. MakerDAO will pay a 0.15% sorting fee to BlockTower, which amounts to over $1.9 million. Celadon Financial Group will act as the broker, and Wedbush Securities will custody the assets.

The voting page shows that the community approved the proposal with an overwhelming majority, with 99.99% of the votes in favor of Project Andromeda.

The approval to buy $1.28 billion worth of US Treasury bonds comes just months after the Maker community approved a proposal to increase its US Treasury bond portfolio holdings to 150%, from $500 million to $1.25 billion. The latest approval comes just a day after Circle, a fellow stablecoin issuer, removed all US Treasury bonds from the reserve that backs their USDC stablecoin.

Reportedly, the DeFi Protocol also purchased $1.1 billion in government and corporate bonds earlier this year through a vault led by asset manager Monetalis Clysdale.

item.title: Silvergate Agrees With The Fed With A Self-Liquidation Plan Within 10 Days
item.dc:creator: Foxy
item.description: Silvergate Bank has agreed to the Federal Reserve's order and will submit a self-liquidation plan to the California financial regulator within 10 days.
item.content:encoded:
Key Points:

  • Silvergate Bank voluntarily agreed to the Fed’s order and will submit a self-liquidation plan within 10 days.
  • Banks must save cash and other resources to ensure the safety of depositors.
  • As part of the order, the regulator must approve any bonuses, promotions, or severance payments to senior executives.
Silvergate Bank has agreed to the Federal Reserve’s order and will submit a self-liquidation plan to the California financial regulator within 10 days.

The Federal Reserve Board of Governors announced the order on Wednesday as part of Silvergate’s shutdown process. Although the bank voluntarily declared liquidation with a plan of “full refund of all deposits.” Banks must preserve cash and other resources to compensate depositors.

The California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation must approve Silvergate’s plan to liquidate assets. This bank announced it would be shutting down in March of this year.

The Fed’s order notes that recent Silvergate audits by state regulators and officials from the San Francisco Fed “discovered many deficiencies in its safety, soundness, and compliance. “It linked the bank’s failure to its transactions with the now-defunct cryptocurrency exchange FTX.

Fed said the failure of FTX and Alameda, combined with Silvergate’s business strategy tied to the digital asset industry and a banking run prelude to similar higher-impact operations in the Valley Silicon and Signature Bank “has led to the funding and liquidity stress for the bank and a decline in processes that are the primary source of revenue.

The Fed statement noted that Silvergate executives voluntarily consented to all elements of the enforcement action. The regulator must approve any bonuses, promotions, or severance packages for executives as part of the order.

Silvergate was the first central crypto-friendly bank to close operations, followed by Silicon Valley Bank and Signature Bank. Many digital asset companies – including Coinbase, Paxos, Gemini, Bitstamp, and Galaxy Digital – previously had financial ties to Silvergate but announced that they would be leaving following allegations that the bank was involved in the collapse of FTX.

item.description: Derivatives exchange Coinbase will begin offering Bitcoin and Ether futures to its institutional clients starting June 5.
item.content:encoded:
Key Points:

  • Derivatives exchange Coinbase will begin offering Bitcoin and Ether futures to its institutional clients starting June 5.
  • Two new futures contracts to enable investors to precisely manage risk and target attractive returns at lower fees than other US-regulated derivatives exchanges.
  • Institutional futures contracts will be 1 BTC and 10 ETH and expire monthly.
Coinbase’s CFTC-regulated derivatives trading platform recently announced the launch of an institutional futures service with Bitcoin and Ether contracts for its institutional clients starting June 5, 2023.

According to a Coinbase blog post, institutional contacts will be 1 BTC and 10 ETH, allowing derivatives exchange customers to manage their exposure to crypto assets.

Bitcoin (BTI) and Ether (ETI) futures contracts will be made available to customers through third-party institutional futures commission traders (FCM) and leading brokers. Institutional clients who are early adopters of new derivatives may be eligible for various incentive schemes.

Two new futures contracts to enable investors to precisely manage risk and target attractive returns at lower fees than other US-regulated derivatives exchanges.

“With the launch of these institutional-sized USD-settled contracts, we look to empower institutional participants with greater precision in managing crypto exposure, expressing directional views, or tracking Bitcoin and Ether returns in a capital-efficient way. Coinbase Derivatives Exchange is committed to delivering innovative solutions that cater specifically to the needs of institutional investors.”

The new crypto offerings come less than a year after the derivatives exchange launched its nano Bitcoin and nano Ether derivatives. In addition to lower exchange fees, eligible institutions may qualify for various incentive programs if they are early adopters of these contracts.

The new derivatives will be offered in the form of USD-settled index futures and will expire every month. Each BTI and ETI contract represents 1 Bitcoin and Ether, respectively. In June 2022, Coinbase Derivatives Exchange launched Bitcoin nano futures contracts for its retail clients. Followed by the launch of nano Ether futures in August 2022.

item.title: SKALE Launched New Decentralized ZK Scaling Solution
item.dc:creator: Harold
item.description: SKALE has published the Levitation Protocol, a ZK rollup designed to give Ethereum developers with a new scaling alternative.
item.content:encoded:
Key Points:

  • SKALE has published the Levitation Protocol, a ZK rollup designed to give Ethereum developers with a new scaling alternative.
  • To supplement Levitation, the core team wants to develop a standalone decentralized Layer 1 blockchain.
  • A public testnet will be launched later this year, with a mainnet deployment scheduled for Q4 2023.
The “Levitation Protocol,” a new, fully-decentralized ZK scaling solution, has been launched by SKALE, the leading Ethereum scaling blockchain.

The Levitation Protocol will expand the possibilities of the ecosystem by allowing any operator of Zero Knowledge Proofs to provide a decentralized ZK solution to application developers through a SKALE Chain.

SKALE is an ecosystem of over 20 application-specific sidechains that run alongside Ethereum. These chains have the potential to give scaling advantages by deploying ZK-Rollups, which, together with Optimistic Rollups, are the most extensively used Layer 2 solutions.

The introduction of SKALE G (G for Ganymede, the biggest moon in the solar system), which promises to be the world’s fastest and most scalable decentralized Layer 1 blockchain, will help with levitation. This blockchain will be particularly created for publishing Levitation-derived Layer 2 ZK proofs back to Ethereum, with the goal of increasing Ethereum’s scalability by employing off-chain computing while maintaining the primary blockchain’s security.

SKALE Labs CEO and co-founder Jack O’Holleran stated:

“The Levitation Protocol will take SKALE to the next level, offering even more options for developers and businesses to build and scale their decentralized applications. We’re excited to see the impact Levitation will have on the future of the blockchain industry.”

A public testnet is expected later this year, with the mainnet launching in the fourth quarter of 2023. This, according to SKALE contributors, indicates that the network is aiming towards a thorough scaling-centric strategy.

As ZK projects scramble to build decentralized app-chain networks, the chain already has the world’s most robust and has completed over 70M transactions, making it naturally capable of integrating the best-in-class ZK EVM solutions.

The Dartmouth Blockchain Group just named SKALE the fastest blockchain in the world. The network has already established itself as one of the top ten blockchains in terms of daily transaction volume, with 86% month-over-month growth and over 400,000 unique users served in the previous 6 months. By providing app-specific chains, Layer 1, and Layer 2 alternatives, it takes a giant step ahead as a full-fledged blockchain scaling platform with the Levitation Protocol.

item.title: Nike Teams Up With EA Sports To Drive Web3 Business
item.dc:creator: Harold
item.description: Nike and EA Sports are collaborating to bring .SWOOSH platform digital creations to the EA Sports gaming environment.
item.content:encoded:
Key Points:

  • Nike and EA Sports are collaborating to bring .SWOOSH platform digital creations to the EA Sports gaming environment.
  • The new cooperation aims to deliver immersive experiences while enabling customers to personalize inside the EA Sports universe.
Nike and EA Sports have announced a collaboration that would bring select virtual assets generated by .SWOOSH, Nike’s Web3 commerce platform, to future EA Sports products.

There have been no particular titles mentioned, and neither company has revealed much detail about what we may anticipate, however, Nike said in a press release that the relationship would enable .SWOOSH members and EA Sports fans express their unique style via play. Within the EA Sports ecosystem, this offers immersive experiences and increased degrees of customization.

According to a Nike statement, the company will provide further details on how its NFTs will be integrated into EA’s games in the coming months.

Nike’s newest partner in its effort to integrate Web3 into its company is EA. According to Ron Faris, vice president of Nike Virtual Studios, the relationship will unleash new experiences for the .SWOOSH community as well as the enormous EA SPORTS fan base.

“Nike and EA SPORTS share a commitment to innovation, creativity, and excellence, and we are thrilled to partner with them. This partnership will allow us to unlock some incredible new experiences for our .SWOOSH community and the massive EA SPORTS fan base,” Faris stated.

Electronic Arts’s EA Sports branch is home to gaming titles such as Apex Legends, The Sims, and Battlefield. Since its foundation in 1991, EA Sports has published sports games under the Madden NFL, FIFA, NHL, and NASCAR names.

.SWOOSH issued its first NFT collection on its platform last month, despite being restricted to the general public, selling over 92,000 NFTs. The debut of the Our Force 1 started with an NFT airdrop, followed by the sale of digital shoe boxes that “open” into digital shoes.

According to a Dune Analytics dashboard, Nike has enjoyed enormous financial success from their NFT launches so far, garnering over $186 million in total sales since December 2021.

item.title: MakerDAO Proposes Eliminate Of $500M In USDP From Its Reserves
item.dc:creator: Harold
item.description: MakerDAO wants to lower the USDP peg stability module debt limit from 500 million DAI to 0 DAI.
item.content:encoded:
Key Points:

  • MakerDAO wants to lower the USDP peg stability module debt limit from 500 million DAI to 0 DAI.
  • The ruling has a profound influence on Paxos, the controversial stablecoin issuer.
  • The market value of Paxos’s BUSD has dropped from more than $16 billion to $5.2 billion.
The community of the decentralized finance (DeFi) lending technology MakerDAO decided Thursday to remove the $500 million Paxos Dollar (USDP) stablecoin from its reserves.

The move has a huge influence on Paxos since Maker’s treasury controls almost half of USDP’s $1 billion supply.

This comes after New York state officials ordered the business to stop minting Binance USD (BUSD), another Paxos-led stablecoin, in February. Many unsolved concerns relating to Paxos’ monitoring of its relationship with Binance resulted in the order.

According to CoinMarketCap statistics, the market value of BUSD has dropped from more than $16 billion to $5.2 billion since then.

Voters overwhelmingly supported lowering the USDP debt cap from $500 million to zero, affecting half of the token’s supply.

MakerDAO, one of the major lending protocols in DeFi, intends to increase income by investing its substantial reserves in yield-generating techniques.

Gemini, the GUSD stablecoin’s issuer, rewards MakerDAO for holding their stablecoin, and MakerDAO will soon receive a 2.6% dividend on up to $500 million in USDC via Coinbase Prime. Via investment management companies, the protocol is also increasingly investing in real-world assets (RWA), such as tokenized short-term US Treasury bonds.

MakerDAO has spent little more than $10.8 million in DAI as of June 2 to address increasing expenditures in 2023 alone. DAI is an algorithmic stablecoin created and controlled by MakerDAO that tracks the value of the US dollar. It is distinct from other prominent fiat-pegged stablecoins, such as the USDT or BUSD, which are produced by a centralized body and require each token in circulation to be backed by an equivalent amount of fiat money, typically the USD.
